properties.address: Radnorshire Indoor Bowls Association, Llandrindod Wells, Powys LD1 5EY
properties.description: The club is open to all who can enjoy all the facilites which include: Bowls. (We are happy to provide equipment for beginners, without charge) Pool Darts Bowlers Retreat Cafe and Bar Lounge Area Disabled Parking and Toilets Free WIFI The Radnorshire Indoor Bowling Assocation is a Registered Charity
properties.title: Indoor Bowls Club
